text:
2003, probably June. 
I was trying to get permission to set up WSUS for our environment. 
IT Director wasn't having it -"We don't need it", said he. 
I downloaded the PoC for SMBDie, and told him to pay attention to his computer. 
I don't see anything, he said. 
Wait a moment more, I said. 
After the bluescreen, I asked for WSUS again. 
He consented.... 
Kurt

metadata.topic: RE: End of the week thoughts - what are your thoughts on 20 years of Patch Tuesday?
metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] RE: End of the week thoughts - what are your thoughts on 20 years of Patch Tuesday?
